titleStmt.title: English paradise Discouered in the Latine prospect of Iacobs blessing. Preached at S. Buttolphs without Aldersgate at London, on the holy Sabboth commonly called Trinitie Sunday, in that ioifull season of the festiuall solemnities for the blessed creation of the most gracious Prince of Wales.
titleStmt.author: White, John, 1570-1615.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Hall for Richard Redmer, and are to be sold at the Starre at the west end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: Ih. Wh., i.e. John White.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the Starre at the west end of Pauls
